title: Number Line
text: To think about this question, you might want to locate $$-2$$ and $$5$$ on a number line.
speech: To think about this question, you might want to locate  minus 2  and  5  on a number line.
pacedSpeech: To think about this question, you might want to locate   minus 2

title: Using Number Line to Reach Conclusion
text: For numbers a and $$b$$, when a is to the left of $$b$$ on the number line, we say $$a<b$$ (read "a is less than b").
speech: For numbers a and  b , when a is to the left of  b  on the number line, we say  a is less than b  (read "a is less than b").
pacedSpeech: , when a is to the left of   b
on the number line, we say   a is less than b

title: Answer
text: Since $$-2$$ is to the left of $$5$$ on the number line, we say $$-2<5$$.
speech: Since  minus, 2  is to the left of  5  on the number line, we say  negative 2 is less than 5 .
pacedSpeech: on the number line, we say   negative 2 is less than 5
